query: 如图,E为平行四边形ABCD内一点,且EA=EB=EC,若∠D=50°,则∠AEC的度数是()选项：['90°', '95°', '100°', '110°']
answer: 解:∵四边形ABCD是平行四边形,∴∠ABC=∠D=50°,∵EA=EB=EC,∴∠EAB=∠EBA,∠EBC=∠ECB,∴∠EAB+∠ECB=∠EBA+∠EBC=∠ABC=50°,∴∠AEB+∠BEC=(180°-∠EAB-∠EBA)+(180°-∠EBC-∠ECB)=360°-(∠EAB+∠ECB+∠EBA+∠EBC)=360°-100°=260°,∴∠AEC=360°-∠AEB-∠BEC=100°．故选:C．
